definitions.definition: ( slang ) A crazy or deranged person; a lunatic.
( chiefly Scotland , Ulster ) A boy , a lad .
( Ireland , historical ) An English soldier of an expeditionary army in Ireland.
( traffic engineering ) A round area of pavement that protrudes from one side of a road to accommodate turning vehicles with a wide turning circle .

main_definition: ( slang ) A crazy or deranged person; a lunatic.
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Scotland , Ulster ) A boy , a lad .
( Ireland , historical ) An English soldier of an expeditionary army in Ireland.
( traffic engineering ) A round area of pavement that protrudes from one side of a road to accommodate turning vehicles with a wide turning circle .

definitions.definition: Any of various birds , of the order Gaviiformes , of North America and Europe that dive for fish and have a short tail , webbed feet and a yodeling cry .

main_definition: ( US , Canada ) Any of various birds , of the order Gaviiformes , of North America and Europe that dive for fish and have a short tail , webbed feet and a yodeling cry .
